text: Las Flores Airport is an airport serving the Magdalena River port of El Banco, in the Magdalena Department of Colombia. The airport is north of the town. The El Banco VOR-DME (Ident: ELB) and non-directional beacon (Ident: ELB) are located on the field.El Banco VOR ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Las Flores *OurAirports - Las Flores *SkyVector - Las Flores *FallingRain - Las Flores Airport * * Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
title: Las Flores Airport (Colombia)
